div.div:
350 Edgewood Avenue, Audubon, NJ 08106-2299
Phone 856-547-7695 | Fax 856-546-8550

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: District Mobile App - Available for Free
a.span: District Mobile App - Available for Free

li.a: District Mobile App - Available for Free

span.style: font-size: 13px; font-family: Tahoma; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: In partnership with our students, families, and communities, the Audubon Public Schools will educate all students by providing motivating and challenging learning experiences embedded in technology that prepare them to achieve the New Jersey Student Learning Standards at all grade levels, in a safe setting of mutual respect, in order to develop ethical, productive citizens who will contribute to the local and global community.

span.style: font-family: garamond, serif; font-size: large;

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: If you would like to report an incident, please contact the appropriate school personnel.

a.title: NJDOE Guidance for Schools on Implementing the Anti-Bullying Bill of Rights Act
a.strong: NJDOE Guidance for Schools on Implementing the Anti-Bullying Bill of Rights Act

strong.br:
​
Harassment, Intimidation, and Bullying (HIB) Report Form
​

​

​NJDOE 2017-2018 District & School Self-Assessment Report for
Determining Grades under the Anti-Bullying Bill of Rights
